data.title: Summer Camp – Jabbers Play
data.text:
Summer Camp

June 3rd to August 9th

Offered Monday through Friday

10am to 4pm

Ages 3 – 8

Consistent Camp Days

2 Days per Week – $50 /Day

3 Days per Week – $48 /Day

Each additional sibling 10% off

Pay in 3 easy installments!

Drop-in Day Camp

$52 /day

Reserve a Drop-in time within 48 hours

For day-before or same-day reservations please email jabbersllc@gmail.com or call 208-899-0579

Benefits of Our Camp

Socialization and learning through interactive play

Child-directed, teacher-facilitated engagement

Development of creativity with arts and crafts, rhythm with music and dance, and fine motor skills through legos and building blocks

Core Values of Camp

We believe kindness teaches us to extend ourselves in every day opportunities

We believe in developing generosity through sharing and giving of our time

We build trustworthiness by practicing small responsibilities in tangible moments

We believe that the first lesson in independence is giving of yourself without losing yourself

We believe that empathy is our biggest key to understanding and perspective

A Typical Day of Summer Camp

Check-in

Circle discussion and “getting to know each other”/story time

Free play on Jabbers floor

Craft/build

Lunch

Music/dance

Free play on Jabbers floor

Pick-up

Summer Camp Registration

Registration for 2024 now closed.
